alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 11:47AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern St. Louis County through 1230 PM CDT... At 1147 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Cusson, to 9 miles north of Lake Vermilion, to near Tower, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Vermilion, Tower, Orr, Crane Lake, Burntside Lake, Buyck, Pelican Lake, Cusson, Voyageurs National Park, Kabetogama Lake, Black Duck Lake, Soudan, Cummings Lake, Trout Lake, Lac la Croix, Soudan Underground Mine State Park, Lake Agnes, Crooked Lake, Sand Point Lake, and Loon Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North St. Louis
